result.execSummary:
The defendant Morgan J Molina was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Morgan J Molina is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Morgan J Molina was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $265.60 fine/costs to be paid to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be tax intercept, suspension and/or civil judgment.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $200.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court Office within 60 days or set up payment plan. Failure to pay will be tax intercept, suspension and/or civil judgment.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
